emailVerification.title: Verify your email address
emailVerification.message: Please click the button below to verify your email address.
emailVerification.footer: If you did not request verification, please ignore this email.

airsoftInvitation.message: You are invited to join the {clubName} club.
airsoftInvitation.footer: If you did not expect this invitation, please ignore this email.

createAccount.title: You are invited to an airsoft event!
createAccount.invitationTitle: You are invited to an airsoft event!
createAccount.message: You are invited to join the {eventName} event that will take place on {eventDate}.
createAccount.clubMessage: Your account will automatically be linked to club {clubName} and you will be able to access match details immediately.
createAccount.emailLinked: This link is associated with the email address: {email}
createAccount.footer: If you were not expecting this invitation, please ignore this email.

rateEvent.title: Rate your experience at {eventName}!
rateEvent.heading: How was your event?

hero.title:
Just Airsoft,

but better.
hero.description: Join the most advanced airsoft community. Find matches, connect with players and improve your game.

eventCard.privateEvent: This is a private event, but you are in the {clubName} club.

sponsors.title: Sponsors and partners
sponsors.description: It is realistic to say that this site would not exist without the engagement and support of everyone you can find below. Thank you.
sponsors.contactDescription: Want to help or have questions?

about.title: Who are we?
about.subtitle: We are two programmers from Bosnia and Herzegovina who decided to move Airsoft events from Facebook and Viber to something "ours".

platform.title: About the platform
platform.description: The ultimate goal of the <logo></logo> platform is the unification of the airsoft community in Bosnia and Herzegovina, and perhaps beyond. Our platform allows clubs to present themselves, organize events, and find new members. It enables players to find clubs, events, and other players, all in one place.

sustainability.title: Sustainability
sustainability.description: The goal is not, and never will be pure profit. Every part of the platform will eventually be open-source, and thus available to everyone. Currently, we are completely self-funding the platform's development, but we will give clubs and individuals a chance to help with development and maintenance, with some benefits.
sustainability.emphasis: Core functionalities will always be free to use.

help.title: How to help?
help.description: If you are interested in helping with the development of the platform, please feel free to contact us. Help in the form of marketing, programming, and general sponsorship is always welcome.

metadata.description: The first universal platform for airsoft clubs, events, and players.

steps.step1: Open Google Maps and find the desired location
steps.step3: In the share dialog, select the "Embed a map" tab

about.title: About us
about.description: RECONNED is a new platform for airsoft enthusiasts. Discover clubs, events, and players across Bosnia and Herzegovina. Manage your club, organize events, and find new opportunities. RECONNED is a project created by 2 airsoft players from BiH - <omar></omar> and <safet></safet>
